name: Fetch (itch) (stugray)
description:
Fetch is the exciting story of a dog, a ball and his owner.

If you don't see the game above, you need to be running Flash. Its a pity you don't want to use it, because you're missing out on the greatest game ever made. Ever.

Controls

Press [Space] to drop and throw the ball.

Press [Left]/[Right] to move.
